title: I3S Attribute (i.e. Field) domain
description: see [A quick tour of attribute domains](http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap/latest/manage-data/geodatabases/an-overview-of-attribute-domains.htm) for more info on domains

name.description: name of the domain. must be unique per Scene Layer

fieldType.description: The field type is the type of attribute field with which the domain can be associated.

range.description: Range of the domain (numeric types only)

codedValues.description: Range of the domain (string types only)

mergePolicy.description: Merge policy for the domain. (unused by Scene Layers)

splitPolicy.description: Split policy for the domain. (unused by Scene Layers)
